subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In his at-bats in the Mets’ 5-1 loss to the Braves on Tuesday, John Niese demonstrated his work-in-progress status at the major league level.
snippet: In his at-bats in the Mets’ 5-1 loss to the Braves on Tuesday, John Niese demonstrated his work-in-progress status at the major league level.
